node.excerpt: A few months ago I was invited back to the university I used to attend, the University of the West of Scotland. To deliver my third student presentation and my second presentation on getting a job in the tech industry after graduating. I was more than happy to do this, I really enjoyed doing the last two presentation and I’m always willing to help people that are in the same situation as I was.
node.title: Student Employment Advice Presentation – 2019

node.excerpt: So around two months ago at my current job we took on a 3rd year university student for a summer placement. He was originally going to spend his first few days, shadowing one of our project managers who would also be responsible mentoring him and managing the project he would be working on.
node.title: My First Week Being Shadowed

node.excerpt: A few weeks ago while browsing Reddit, I see the post below in the r/webdev subreddit, showing off a web app called Log Time.
node.title: React Projects – Time Tracker
